title: What We Learned from Justice Barrett's First Arguments
itunes:title: What We Learned from Justice Barrett's First Arguments
description:
Kimberly Strawbridge Robinson, Bloomberg Law Supreme Court Reporter, discusses Justice Amy Coney Barrett's first week on the bench and why many female appellate litigators are saying that President-elect Joe Biden should choose a woman to be the U.S. Solicitor General. Kyle Trygstad, Bloomberg Law Politics Editor, discusses the strategies at play in the Georgia Senate Runoffs. June Grasso hosts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
